columns.query: Can you say a single country to describe the setting the journal is analyzing? Say nothing else except the country.
Can you say a maximum of 6 words to describe the type of data the journal is analyzing? Say nothing except the data type.
Can you say a maximum of 6 words to describe the target population the journal is analyzing? Say nothing except the target population.
Can you summarize the journal in a paragraph? Say nothing except the paragraph.
